__e: Let me tell you something, okay? I don't know who the fuck you think you are, but I don't work like this.
You listen to me, if you want to be a man, you can't let a woman tell you what to do!
"And hey, mark my words - when you have less time..."
Listen to me, I don't know what you've heard, but I can explain it all.
Listen to me, I died in 1938 and there is not a day that goes by that I don't wonder the things I did, things I didn't do.
Now listen, I am the only person in this family who doesn't curse.
Listen to me, you're too young, you didn't kill anybody.
You don't know what you're doing.
You did what you had to do.
